Class TasksResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.api.rest.v1.tasks.TasksResource
  • @Path("/tasks")
public class TasksResource
extends Object
    Create and monitor (possibly time consuming) tasks within the viewer. These tasks are managed by the TaskManager
    Author:
    florian
